title: Sci-Fi Survival Sound Effects Collection
description: Am extensive set of 160 futuristic sound effects designed for sci-fi survival games.
longDescription:
Am extensive set of 160 futuristic sound effects designed for sci-fi survival games.

Â 

This library includes the soundscapes of harsh environments, medical and survivalist tools, resource gathering sounds and many other.

technicalDetails:
Features: 169 stereo .wav sound effects

Number of Audio Waves: 160

Number of Audio Cues: 160

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
